headline: Medical Affairs Leader Dr. Kirk Shepard Joins BP Logix’s Life Sciences Strategic Advisory Board
summary: SAN DIEGO, August 26, 2025--As part of its mission to drive innovation in Medical Affairs automation, BP Logix is pleased to announce the appointment of Dr. Kirk Shepard to the company's Life Sciences Strategic Advisory Board.
